name: SecPadding
desc: The types of padding to use when you create or verify a digital signature.

items.name: static var PKCS1MD2: SecPadding
items.desc: Data to be signed is an MD2 hash.

items.name: static var PKCS1MD5: SecPadding
items.desc: Data to be signed is an MD5 hash.

items.name: static var PKCS1SHA1: SecPadding
items.desc: Data to be signed is a SHA1 hash.

items.name: static var PKCS1SHA224: SecPadding
items.desc: Data to be signed is a SHA224 hash.

items.name: static var PKCS1SHA256: SecPadding
items.desc: Data to be signed is a SHA256 hash.

items.name: static var PKCS1SHA384: SecPadding
items.desc: Data to be signed is a SHA384 hash.

items.name: static var PKCS1SHA512: SecPadding
items.desc: Data to be signed is a SHA512 hash.
